member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the directory to be watched for files.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.FilePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used to match file that appear in the watch folder.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.RetransmissionStat
member.summary: Gets or sets the statistic that defines the number of buffer block retransmissions in the system.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.BlockSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of each block of data that is read from the file.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.WatchInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in seconds, between each scan of the watch folder.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.ProcessInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in seconds, between each publication of a block of data from the active file.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.RetransmissionThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage of buffer blocks that can be retransmitted during a reporting interval before the begins throttling its buffer blocks.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.BlockSizeAdjustment
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage of adjustment to be applied to the buffer size when throttling buffer blocks.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.ProcessIntervalAdjustment
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage of adjustment to be applied to the process interval when throttling buffer blocks.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.AdjustedBlockSize
member.summary: Gets the block size after making adjustments for throttling.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.AdjustedProcessInterval
member.summary: Gets the process interval after making adjustments for throttling.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.InputMeasurementKeys
member.summary: Gets or sets primary keys of input measurements the expects, if any.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.FramesPerSecond
member.summary: Gets or sets the frames per second to be used by the .
member.remarks: Overridden to hide base class attributes.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.LagTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed past time deviation tolerance, in seconds (can be sub-second).

remarks.para: Defines the time sensitivity to past measurement timestamps.
The number of seconds allowed before assuming a measurement timestamp is too old.
This becomes the amount of delay introduced by the concentrator to allow time for data to flow into the system.

member.exception: LagTime must be greater than zero, but it can be less than one.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.LeadTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed future time deviation tolerance, in seconds (can be sub-second).

remarks.para: Defines the time sensitivity to future measurement timestamps.
The number of seconds allowed before assuming a measurement timestamp is too advanced.
This becomes the tolerated +/- accuracy of the local clock to real-time.

member.exception: LeadTime must be greater than zero, but it can be less than one.
